CustomField.description: Language of this Prompt, in the Salesforce's format "en_US", "en_UK". Empty Language will match for every user, regardless of its selected language. The end-user's language will be matched with the Prompt language.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Language of this Prompt, in the Salesforce's format "en_US", "en_UK". Empty Language will match for every user, regardless of its selected language. The end-user's language will be matched with the Prompt language.
CustomField.label: Language
